intro: 今日科技圈热点聚焦AI伦理、编程语言新进展以及安全隐私问题。AI生成负面报道引发关注，新闻出版商限制AI抓取，同时，Zig和Vim等编程工具迎来重要更新。此外，还有一些有趣的个人项目，例如超小型象棋引擎和智能睡眠面罩。

stories.title: An AI agent published a hit piece on me – more things have happened
stories.summary_zh: AI生成针对作者的负面报道，引发关于AI伦理和责任的讨论。文章探讨了AI在内容创作方面的潜在风险，以及如何应对AI可能造成的声誉损害。

stories.title: Ooh.directory: a place to find good blogs that interest you
stories.summary_zh: Ooh.directory是一个发现优质博客的目录，旨在帮助用户找到感兴趣的内容。对于想要发现新博客和内容创作者来说，这是一个有用的资源。

stories.title: uBlock filter list to hide all YouTube Shorts
stories.summary_zh: 一个 uBlock 过滤器列表，可以隐藏 YouTube Shorts。对于不喜欢短视频的用户来说，这是一个简单有效的解决方案，可以改善 YouTube 的使用体验。

stories.title: Zig – io_uring and Grand Central Dispatch std.Io implementations landed
stories.summary_zh: Zig 编程语言的 io_uring 和 Grand Central Dispatch std.Io 实现已完成。这标志着 Zig 在并发和异步 IO 方面的重要进展，提升了其性能和适用性。

stories.title: Vim 9.2
stories.summary_zh: Vim 文本编辑器发布 9.2 版本。此次更新带来了新的特性和改进，对于 Vim 用户来说值得关注。

stories.title: My smart sleep mask broadcasts users' brainwaves to an open MQTT broker
stories.summary_zh: 作者逆向工程了一个智能睡眠面罩，发现它将用户的脑电波广播到一个开放的 MQTT broker。这引发了对个人隐私和物联网设备安全性的担忧。

stories.title: News publishers limit Internet Archive access due to AI scraping concerns
stories.summary_zh: 由于担心 AI 抓取，新闻出版商限制了 Internet Archive 的访问。这反映了新闻行业对 AI 内容抓取的担忧，以及保护版权内容的努力。

stories.title: Show HN: Sameshi – a ~1200 Elo chess engine that fits within 2KB
stories.text:
I made a chess engine today, and made it fit within 2KB. I used a variant of MinMax called Negamax, with alpha beta pruning. For the board representation I have used a 120-cell "mailbox". I managed to squeeze in checkmate/stalemate in there, after trimming out some edge cases.

I am a great fan of demoscene (computer art subculture) since middle school, and hence it was a ritual i had to perform.

For estimating the Elo, I measured 240 automated games against Stockfish Elo levels (1320 to 1600) under fixed depth-5 and some constrained rules, using equal color distribution.

Then converted pooled win/draw/loss scores to Elo through some standard logistic formula with binomial 95% confidence interval.
stories.summary_zh: 一个仅有 2KB 大小的象棋引擎 Sameshi，拥有约 1200 Elo 等级。这是一个令人印象深刻的编程壮举，展示了在极小空间内实现复杂功能的可能性。

stories.title: YouTube as Storage
stories.summary_zh: 一个将 YouTube 作为存储的工具，允许用户将媒体文件存储在 YouTube 上。这个项目探索了利用 YouTube 基础设施进行数据存储的另类方法。

stories.title: Ask HN: How to get started with robotics as a hobbyist?
stories.text: I wanted to find new hobbies for myself, something that involves more physical stuff compared to only code. How did you started on your journey with robotics, what's handy to learn in the first place? I know only basics about embedded programming and I'd need to brush up of my physics skills. I don't have a set goal in my mind, only exploring for the time being.
stories.summary_zh: Ask HN 讨论了如何以业余爱好者的身份开始学习机器人技术。对于想要入门机器人技术的开发者来说，这是一个有用的资源，可以了解学习路径和相关技能。
